Adrenaline.card_desc: [Armor] Eliminations reduce all active cooldowns by {scale=10|10}%

Barkskin.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your base maximum Health by {scale=75|75}.

Chop Down.card_desc: [Crippling Throw] Reduce the Cooldown of Crippling Throw by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Chopper.card_desc: [Crippling Throw] Hitting an enemy with Crippling Throw heals you for {scale=100|100}.

Deep Roots.card_desc: [Crippling Throw] Crippling Throw now roots for 1s and bounces between enemies.

Fatalis.card_desc: [Crippling Throw] Hitting an enemy with Crippling Throw increases your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 2s.

Ferocity.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase your damage scaling over distance by 60%

Force of Nature.card_desc: [Armor] Dropping to or below 50% health grants a {scale=150|150}hp Shield for 3s.

Gentle Breeze.card_desc: [Blossom] Allies gain {scale=5|5}% Movement Speed for 4s after being healed by Blossom.

Heavenly Agility.card_desc: [Vine] Increase the Pull Speed of Vine by {scale=6|6}%.

Nature's Quickness.card_desc: [Vine] Gain {scale=8|8}% Movement Speed for 2s after using Vine

Over Growth.card_desc: [Vine] Dropping below {scale=15|15}% of your max health reduces the Cooldown of Vine by 100%.

Perennial.card_desc: [Blossom] Reduce the Cooldown of Blossom by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Pick Up.card_desc: [Crippling Throw] Hitting an enemy with Crippling Throw reduces the cooldown of Vine by {scale=1|1}s.

Rampant Blooming.card_desc: [Blossom] Healing allies with Blossom will heal them for an additional 150 Health per second for 3s.

Unstoppable.card_desc: [Blossom] Gain {scale=6|6}% damage reduction for 4s after using Blossom.

Verdant Expanse.card_desc: [Blossom] Increase the radius of Blossom by {scale=10|10}%

Vine Grasp.card_desc: [Vine] Increase the range of Vine by {scale=10|10}%

Adrenalin.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen reduzieren alle aktiven Abklingzeiten um {scale=10|10}%.

Brutalit\u00e4t.card_desc: [Waffe] Erhöht deinen Schadensbonus auf Distanz um 60%.

Eile der Natur.card_desc: [Weinrebe] Erhöht dein Lauftempo nach Aktivierung von Weinrebe 2s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

Erholung.card_desc: [Rüstung] Unter 50% Gesundheit erhältst du um {scale=5|5}% erhöhte Heilung.

Fatalis.card_desc: [Lähmungswurf] Treffer mit Lähmungswurf erhöhen dein Lauftempo 2s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Gr\u00fcnfl\u00e4che.card_desc: [Blüte] Erhöht den Radius von Blüte um {scale=10|10}%.

Hacker.card_desc: [Lähmungswurf] Triffst du einen Gegner mit Lähmungswurf, wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Himmlischer Schwung.card_desc: [Weinrebe] Erhöht das Zugtempo von Weinrebe um {scale=6|6}%.

Immerw\u00e4hrend.card_desc: [Blüte] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Blüte um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Nachschlag.card_desc: [Lähmungswurf] Treffer mit Lähmungswurf reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Weinrebe um {scale=1|1}s.

Naturgewalt.card_desc: [Rüstung] Fällst du auf oder unter 50% deiner maximalen Gesundheit, erhältst du 3s lang einen Schild mit {scale=150|150} LP.

Rebenklammer.card_desc: [Weinrebe] Erhöht die Reichweite von Weinrebe um {scale=10|10}%.

Rindenhaut.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=75|75} LP.

Sanfte Brise.card_desc: [Blüte] Erhöht das Lauftempo von Verbündeten 4s lang um {scale=5|5}%, nachdem sie mit Blüte geheilt wurden.

Spalten.card_desc: [Lähmungswurf] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Lähmungswurf um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Tiefe Wurzeln.card_desc: [Lähmungswurf] Lähmungswurf verwurzelt nun 1s lang und springt zwischen Gegnern hin und her.

\u00dcberwucherung.card_desc: [Weinrebe] Fällst du unter {scale=15|15}% deiner maximalen Gesundheit, wird die Abklingzeit von Weinrebe um 100% reduziert.

Unaufhaltbar.card_desc: [Blüte] Nach Verwendung von Blüte wird erlittener Schaden 4s lang um {scale=6|6}% reduziert.

Wucherblume.card_desc: [Blüte] Mit Blüte geheilte Verbündete werden zusätzlich 3s lang um 150 LP pro Sekunde geheilt.

Abattre.card_desc: [Lancer handicap.] Lancer handicapant se recharge {scale=0.6|0.6}s plus vite.

Adr\u00e9naline.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=10|10}%.

Agilit\u00e9 c\u00e9leste.card_desc: [Liane] La vitesse de traction de Liane augmente de {scale=6|6}%.

Couperet.card_desc: [Lancer handicap.] Toucher un ennemi avec Lancer handicapant vous rend {scale=100|100} PV.

Douce brise.card_desc: [Fleur] Fleur augmente la vitesse des cibles de {scale=5|5}% pendant 4s.

\u00c9tendue verdoyante.card_desc: [Fleur] Le rayon de Fleur augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Extension.card_desc: [Liane] La portée de Liane augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Fatalis.card_desc: [Lancer handicap.] Pendant 2s après un Lancer handicapant réussi, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

F\u00e9rocit\u00e9.card_desc: [Arme] Vos dégâts augmentent de 60% de plus avec la distance.

Floraison rapide.card_desc: [Fleur] Fleur rend aussi 150 PV par seconde pendant 3s aux alliés atteints.

Force de la nature.card_desc: [Armure] Passer sous 50% de santé donne un bouclier de {scale=150|150} PV pendant 3s.

Irr\u00e9pressible.card_desc: [Fleur] Pendant 4s après Fleur, vous subissez {scale=6|6}% de dégâts en moins.

Racines profondes.card_desc: [Lancer handicapant] Lancer handicapant applique un enracinement de 1s et rebondit entre les ennemis.

Reprise.card_desc: [Lancer handicap.] Toucher un ennemi avec Lancer handicapant réduit le temps de recharge de Liane de {scale=1|1}s.

R\u00e9tablissement.card_desc: [Armure] En-dessous de 50% de PV, vous recevez {scale=5|5}% de soins en plus.

Surcroissance.card_desc: [Liane ] Passer en-dessous de {scale=15|15}% de PV réinitialise le temps de recharge de Liane.

V\u00e9locit\u00e9 naturelle.card_desc: [Liane] Pendant 2s après Liane, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

\u5207\u8089\u65a7.card_desc: [致残投掷] 致残投掷命中时会使你获得{scale=50|50}点治疗

\u52bf\u4e0d\u53ef\u6321.card_desc: [绽放] 使用绽放后4秒内,获得{scale=6|6}%的伤害减免

\u56db\u5b63\u5e38\u9752.card_desc: [绽放] 降低绽放的冷却时间{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u5929\u8d50\u654f\u6377.card_desc: [蔓藤] 藤蔓的拉进速度提高{scale=6|6}%

\u5bbf\u547d.card_desc: [致残投掷] 致残投掷命中敌人将使你的移动速度提升{scale=10|10}%，持续2秒

\u5f3a\u5316\u6811\u76ae.card_desc: [护甲] 使你的生命值上限增加{scale=75|75}

\u5fae\u98ce.card_desc: [绽放] 受到绽放技能治疗的友军会在4秒内获得{scale=8|8}%的移动速度加成

\u679d\u7e41\u53f6\u8302.card_desc: [藤蔓] 生命值低于{scale=15|15}%时藤蔓的冷却时间降低100%

\u6839\u6df1\u8482\u56fa.card_desc: [致残投掷] 致残投掷现在会附带定身效果，且造成伤害提高10%

\u6b8b\u66b4\u98de\u65a7.card_desc: [武器] 远距离伤害加成提高60%

\u751f\u751f\u4e0d\u606f.card_desc: [绽放] 使用绽放治疗友军时，会额外为其每秒回复160点生命值，持续4秒

\u7535\u5149\u706b\u77f3.card_desc: [致残投掷] 致残投掷命中敌人会使藤蔓的冷却时间降低{scale=1|1}秒

\u7eff\u610f\u76ce\u7136.card_desc: [绽放] 增加绽放的有效范围{scale=10|10}%

\u80be\u4e0a\u817a\u7d20.card_desc: [护甲] 击败敌方可以使所有技能的冷却时间降低{scale=10|10}%

\u81ea\u7136\u4e4b\u529b.card_desc: [护甲] 你的移动速度无法被降至{scale=60|10}%以下

\u81ea\u7136\u4e4b\u901f.card_desc: [蔓藤] 使用藤蔓后提高{scale=8|8}%的移动速度，持续2秒

\u91cd\u6574\u65d7\u9f13.card_desc: [护甲] 生命值低于50%时受到的治疗效果提高{scale=5|5}%

\u91ce\u86ee\u5288\u780d.card_desc: [致残投掷] 减少致残投掷的冷却时间{scale=0.6|0.6}秒

Adrenaline.card_desc: [Armor] Health drops grant you 30% Movement Speed for 2s.

Bark Skin.card_desc: [Briars & Blossoms][+3 Per Rank] While on Blossoms, you reduce all hits you take by {6/9/12/15}

Chopper.card_desc: [Axe Throw] Your axe throw heals you for 10% of the damage dealt.

Fatalis.card_desc: [Weapon] Gain 15% Movement Speed for 1s on successful weapon hit. Does not stack.

Forest Expansion.card_desc: [Vine] You may activate Vine once more for 2s after using it.

Harvest.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting an enemy with your weapon spawns a HP Drop that heals for 50.

Heavenly Agility.card_desc: [Nature's Demise] When you activate Nature's Demise all allies within 55 units gain 15% movespeed and 25% increased healing.

Journey.card_desc: [Armor] Regenerate 120 Health per second while mounted.

Nature's Quickness.card_desc: [Briars & Blossoms] When changing to Blossoms, those affected gain 25% Movement Speed for 1s.

Over Growth.card_desc: [Briars & Blossoms] Increase amount healed by 3 per second.

Pick Up.card_desc: [Axe Throw] Axe Throw deals 100 more damage. Hitting a target with your weapon within 5s of them being struck with Axe Throw lowers the Cooldown of Axe Throw by {2}s.

Rebound.card_desc: [Armor] Consuming a Health Drop reduces all Cooldowns by 25%

Unstoppable.card_desc: [Nature's Demise] During nature's demise you gain 20% Crowd Control Reduction.

Vine Grasp.card_desc: [Vine] Hitting a target directly with Vine slows them for 10% for 2s.

Adrenalina.card_desc: [Armadura] Las eliminaciones reducen las recargas activas un {scale=10|10}%.

Agilidad celestial.card_desc: [Enredadera] Aumenta la Velocidad de movimiento de Enredadera un {scale=6|6}%.

Brisa suave.card_desc: [Flores] Los aliados obtienen un {scale=5|5}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 4s tras ser curados por Flores.

Celeridad de la naturaleza.card_desc: [Enredadera] Ganas un {scale=8|8}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 2s después de usar Enredadera

Fatalis.card_desc: [Tiro lesionador] Al dar a un enemigo con Tiro lesionador, tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=10|10}% durante 2s.

Ferocidad.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta la variación de daño por distancia un 60%.

Floraci\u00f3n incontrolable.card_desc: [Flores] Curas a tus aliados con Flores para curarlos con 150 PS adicionales cada segundo durante 3s.

Fuerza natural.card_desc: [Armadura] Bajar al 50 % o menos de tu salud te otorga un escudo con {scale=150|150} PS por 3 s.

Imparable.card_desc: [Flores] Obtienes {scale=6|6}% de reducción de daño durante 4 s después de usarlas.

Perenne.card_desc: [Flores] Se reduce la recarga de Flores en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Piel de corteza.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud base máxima aumenta en {scale=75|75} PS.

Proliferaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Enredadera] Si tu salud máxima está por debajo del {scale=15|15}%, se reduce un 100% la recarga de Enredadera.

Ra\u00edces profundas.card_desc: [Tiro lesionador] Tiro lesionador ahora enraíza durante 1s y rebota entre los enemigos.

Recoger.card_desc: [Tiro lesionador] Al alcanzar a un enemigo con el tiro, reduces la recarga de Enredadera por {scale=1|1} s.

Recuperaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Armadura] Recibe {scale=5|5} % más de curación si tienes menos del 50 % de salud.

Tajadera.card_desc: [Tiro lesionador] Al alcanzar a un enemigo con Tiro lesionador, te curas en {scale=100|100} PS.

Tala.card_desc: [Tiro lesionador] su Recarga se reduce en {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Adrenalina.card_desc: [Armadura] Eliminações reduzem em {scale=10|10}% todos os intervalos ativos.

Adubado.card_desc: [Cipó] Chegar abaixo de {scale=15|15}% da sua vida máxima reduz o intervalo do Cipó em 100%.

Aperto do Cip\u00f3.card_desc: [Cipó] Aumenta o alcance do Cipó em {scale=10|10}%.

Brisa Suave.card_desc: [Primavera] Aliados recebem {scale=5|5}% mais velocidade de movimento por 4s após serem curados pela Primavera.

Casca Grossa.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta em {scale=75|75} a sua vida máxima base.

Expans\u00e3o Verde.card_desc: [Primavera] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% o raio de alcance de Primavera.

Fatalis.card_desc: [Arremesso Especial] Acertar o Arremesso Especial aumenta em {scale=10|10}% sua velocidade de movimento por 2s.

Ferocidade.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta o dano, escalonado pela distância, em 60%.

For\u00e7a da Natureza.card_desc: [Armadura] Concede um escudo de {scale=150|150} de vida por 3s ao chegar a 50% ou menos da sua vida máxima.

Impar\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Primavera] Recebe {scale=6|6}% de redução de dano por 4s após usar Primavera.

Mutilador.card_desc: [Arremesso Especial] Acertar o Arremesso Especial em um inimigo cura você em {scale=100|100}.

Naturalmente \u00c1gil.card_desc: [Cipó] Aumenta a velocidade do puxão do Cipó em {scale=6|6}%.

Pancada.card_desc: [Arremesso Especial] Acertar um inimigo com o Arremesso Especial reduz o intervalo do Cipó em {scale=1|1}s.

Perene.card_desc: [Primavera] Reduz o intervalo de Primavera em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Poda R\u00e1pida.card_desc: [Arremesso Especial] Reduz o intervalo do Arremesso Especial em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Primavera Potente.card_desc: [Primavera] Ao usar Primavera, os aliados serão curados em 150 a mais por segundo, durante 3s.

Ra\u00edzes Fundas.card_desc: [Arremesso Especial] O Arremesso Especial agora enraiza por 1s e ricocheteia entre os inimigos

R\u00e1pido por Natureza.card_desc: [Cipó] Ganha {scale=8|8}% de velocidade de movimento por 2s após usar o Cipó.

Vi\u00e7oso.card_desc: [Armadura] Ganha {scale=5|5}% de cura se estiver com menos de 50% de vida.

\u0410\u0434\u0440\u0435\u043d\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Устранения сокращают текущую перезарядку способностей на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0411\u0443\u0440\u043d\u043e\u0435 \u0.card_desc: [Цветок] Исцеление союзников Цветком исцеляет их еще на 150 ед. в секунду в течение 3 с.

\u0412\u044b\u0440\u0443\u0431\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Парализующий бросок] Перезарядка Парализующего броска сокращается на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u0413\u043b\u0443\u0431\u043e\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Парализующий бросок] Парализующий бросок обездвиживает врагов на 1 с. и отскакивает от одного из них к другому.

\u0414\u0443\u0431\u043e\u0432\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше базовое максимальное здоровье увеличивается на {scale=75|75} ед.

\u0417\u0430\u0440\u043e\u0441\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Лоза] При уровне здоровья ниже {scale=15|15}% от максимального Перезарядка Лозы сокращается на 100%.

\u041b\u0435\u0433\u043a\u0438\u0439 \u0.card_desc: [Цветок] После исцеления Цветком скорость передвижения союзников увеличивается на {scale=5|5}% на 4 с.

\u041c\u044f\u0441\u043e\u0440\u0443\u04.card_desc: [Парализующий бросок] Попадание по врагу Парализующим броском исцеляет вас на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u041d\u0430 \u043b\u0435\u0442\u0443.card_desc: [Парализующий бросок] Попадание по врагу Парализующим броском сокращает перезарядку Лозы на {scale=1|1} с.

\u041d\u0435\u0443\u0434\u0435\u0440\u04.card_desc: [Цветок] Вы получаете на {scale=6|6}% меньше урона в течение 4 с. после использования Цветка.

\u041e\u0442\u0434\u0430\u0447\u0430.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья ниже 50% вы получаете {scale=5|5}% к исцелению.

\u041f\u0440\u0438\u0440\u043e\u0434\u04.card_desc: [Лоза] После использования Лозы ваша скорость передвижения увеличивается на {scale=8|8}% на 2 с.

\u0421\u0432\u0438\u0440\u0435\u043f\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Изменение урона от расстояния увеличивается на 60%.

\u0421\u0438\u043b\u0430 \u043f\u0440\u0.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья ниже 50% вы получаете щит прочностью {scale=150|150} ед. на 3 с.

\u0424\u0430\u0442\u0430\u043b\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Парализующий бросок] Попадание по врагу Парализующим броском увеличивает скорость передвижения на {scale=10|10}% на 2 с.

Adrenalina.card_desc: [Pancerz] Eliminacje skracają aktywne czasy odnowienia o {scale=10|10}%.

Bujne kwitnienie.card_desc: [Rozkwit] Sojusznicy leczeni Rozkwitem odzyskują dodatkowe 150 PZ na 1 s przez 3 s.

Fatalis.card_desc: [Okaleczający rzut] Trafienie wroga Okaleczającym rzutem zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 2 s.

G\u0142\u0119bokie korzenie.card_desc: [Okaleczający rzut] Okaleczający rzut teraz zakorzenia na 1 s i odbija się pomiędzy wrogami.

\u0141agodna bryza.card_desc: [Rozkwit] Uleczeni Rozkwitem sojusznicy otrzymują {scale=5|5}% szybkości ruchu na 4 s.

Niepowstrzymany.card_desc: [Rozkwit] Zyskujesz {scale=6|6}% redukcji obrażeń przez 4 s po użyciu Rozkwitu.

Podniesienie.card_desc: [Okaleczający rzut] Trafienie wroga Okaleczającym rzutem skraca czas odnowienia Winorośli o {scale=1|1} s.

Przyrost.card_desc: [Winorośl] Spadek poniżej {scale=15|15}% maks. PZ skraca czas odnowienia Winorośli o 100%.

Rykoszet.card_desc: [Pancerz] Spadek poniżej 50% PZ, zwiększa otrzymywane leczenie o {scale=5|5}%.

Siekanka.card_desc: [Okaleczający rzut] Skraca czas odnowienia Okaleczającego rzutu o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Si\u0142a natury.card_desc: [Pancerz] Jeśli wartość twoich PZ jest równa lub niższa niż 50%, aktywujesz tarczę o {scale=150|150} pkt. odporności na 3 s.

Szybko\u015b\u0107 natury.card_desc: [Winorośl] Przyznaje {scale=8|8}% szybkości ruchu na 2 s po użyciu Winorośli.

Tasak.card_desc: [Okaleczający rzut] Trafienie wroga okaleczającym rzutem przywraca ci {scale=100|100} PZ.

Trwa\u0142o\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Rozkwit] Skraca czas odnowienia Rozkwitu o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Twarda kora.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=75|75} PZ.

Zaciek\u0142o\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Broń] Zwiększa skalowanie obrażeń na podstawie odległości o 60%.

Adrenalin.card_desc: [Zırh] Saf dışı bırakmalar tüm aktif Bekleme Sürelerini %{scale=10|10} azaltır.

A\u015f\u0131r\u0131 B\u00fcy\u00fcme.card_desc: [Sarmaşık] Maksimum canın %{scale=15|15} altına düşerse Sarmaşık'ın Bekleme Süresi %100 azalır.

Co\u015fkun Filizlenme.card_desc: [Çiçek Aç] Çiçek Aç ile iyileştirilen müttefikler, 3 saniye boyunca saniyede 150 Can daha iyileşir.

Derin K\u00f6kler.card_desc: [Felç Edici Atış] Felç Edici Atış artık 1 saniyeliğine yere çakıyor ve düşmanlar arasında sıçrıyor.

Do\u011fa H\u0131z\u0131.card_desc: [Sarmaşık] Sarmaşık'ı kullandıktan sonra 2 sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} Hareket Hızı kazan.

Do\u011fal Afet.card_desc: [Zırh] Canın %50 ya da altına düşerse 3 sn boyunca {scale=150|150} Canlık bir Kalkan kazanırsın.

Durdurulamaz.card_desc: [Çiçek Aç] Çiçek Aç'ı kullandıktan sonra 4 sn boyunca %{scale=6|6} Hasar Azaltma kazan.

Fatalis.card_desc: [Felç Edici Atış] Felç Edici Atış ile bir düşmanı vurmak Hareket Hızını 2 sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} artırır.

Hafif Meltem.card_desc: [Çiçek Aç] Müttefikler, Çiçek Aç ile iyileştirildikten sonra 4 sn boyunca %{scale=5|5} Hareket Hızı kazanır.

Kesip Bi\u00e7me.card_desc: [Felç Edici Atış] Felç Edici Atış'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.6|0.6} sn azalt.
